title: Angel Biscuits
ingredientsList: 1 tablespoon butter or stick margarine, melted
instructionsList: Dissolve yeast in warm water in a small bowl, and let stand for 5 minutes
Lightly spoon flour into dry measuring cups; level with a knife
Combine flour and next 4 ingredients (flour through salt) in a large bowl
Cut in the shortening with a pastry blender or 2 knives untile mixture resembles coarse meal
Add yeast mixture and buttermilk, and stir just intill moist
Turn dough out onto a havily floured surface, and knead lightly 5 times
Place on a baking sheet coated with cooking spray
Brush melted butter over biscuit top
Bake at 450* for 13 minutes or until golden
